value.string:
portal = context.getPortalObject()
 
 if portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredCredentialRequestAutomaticApproval():
 module = context.getDefaultModule('Credential Request')
 result = module.searchFolder(portal_type='Credential Request',
 validation_state='submitted')
 for document in result:
 document.activate().accept()
 
 if portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredPersonCredentialUpdateAutomaticApproval() and \
 portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredOrganisationCredentialUpdateAutomaticApproval():
 module = context.getDefaultModule('Credential Update')
 result = module.searchFolder(portal_type='Credential Update',
 validation_state='submitted')
 for document in result:
 document.activate().accept()
 elif portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredPersonCredentialUpdateAutomaticApproval() and \
 not portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredOrganisationCredentialUpdateAutomaticApproval():
 module = context.getDefaultModule('Credential Update')
 result = module.searchFolder(portal_type='Credential Update',
 validation_state='submitted')
 for document in result:
 if document.getDestinationDecisionValue().getPortalType() == 'Person':
 document.activate().accept()
 elif not portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredPersonCredentialUpdateAutomaticApproval() and \
 portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredOrganisationCredentialUpdateAutomaticApproval():
 module = context.getDefaultModule('Credential Update')
 result = module.searchFolder(portal_type='Credential Update',
 validation_state='submitted')
 for document in result:
 if document.getDestinationDecisionValue().getPortalType() == 'Organisation':
 document.activate().accept()
 
 if portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredCredentialRecoveryAutomaticApproval():
 module = context.getDefaultModule('Credential Recovery')
 result = module.searchFolder(portal_type='Credential Recovery',
 validation_state='submitted')
 for document in result:
 document.activate().accept()
